textBeforeTable: Courses 2013 Fiscal Year 525.0 Total Hours This major prepares students for a beginning framework for entering the field of education. Students will learn theory, create lesson plans, as well as put their plans into action. Students will complete several field experiences that will help them have a knowledge of the requirements and characteristics that are needed by a teacher.
